name: SEN CHA Naturals Organic Matcha Powder, Authentic Japanese Green Tea, Premium First & Second Harvest Culinary and Ceremonial Grade Matcha Powder, Lattes & Baking, 4oz Bag (1 Pack)
short_description: Certified Organic & Non-GMO; Our USDA-Certified Organic Matcha Green Tea Powder is sourced from the Organic Family Tea Farms in Kagoshima, Japan. Also, this green tea matcha powder is 100% vegan and gluten free.

1st & 2nd Harvest Blend; Our Everyday Matcha tea powder is a unique blend of 1st harvest (ceremonial) and 2nd harvest green tea leaves for a balanced taste of mild sweetness, subtle bitterness, and delicate umami notes.

Versatile & Easy to Use; Organic Japanese green tea matcha powders are perfect for drinking, baking, and blending. Plus, there's no need for fancy bamboo whisks or expensive equipment, just shake or froth it.

Caffeine Without Jitters; Matcha contains the amino acid L-Theanine, which helps slow the body's absorption of caffeine. This allows for longer lasting and steadier energy for the body, using less caffeine.

SEN CHA Naturals; Our mission is making green tea a fun and easy part of your daily routine. Whether you'd rather eat or drink your antioxidants, we believe in getting your green tea fix any way you feel like.

name: Emerail Organic Ceremonial Grade Matcha, Premium First Harvest Matcha Green Tea Powder, 100% Pure USDA-Certified, Sugar-Free Gluten-Free Vegan (60g / 2.1oz)
short_description: ✓ Authentic Matcha Powder: Harvested from the pristine plateau of Jiangkou in Guizhou, China - a pollution-free natural sanctuary near the UNESCO-listed Fanjing Mountain, where ancient tea trees have thrived for over 1,000 years - and crafted by generations of tea masters who have passed down the tradition of tea-making through the ages.

✓ Premium Ceremonial Grade yet Cost Effective: Our matcha is made from the tenderest, shade-grown tea leaves from the first harvest, which are then finely milled to ensure a superior taste and texture. By sourcing our tea directly from our own ecological plantation, we cut out the middlemen and are able to offer you premium ceremonial grade matcha at an unbeatable price.

✓ USDA Certified Organic Matcha Green Tea Powder: Our farms have been inspected and comply with the USDA's strict organic regulations. Tests for pesticide residues, lead and metals have been conducted to ensure its purity and safety. Our matcha is 100% pure, organic and natural. It contains no additives, and is gluten-free and vegan-friendly.

✓ Vibrant Color and Authentic Flavor: This ceremonial-grade matcha boasts a smooth texture, a balanced umami flavour with minimal bitterness. It also has a vibrant green colour. It tastes great on its own or mixed with milk - perfect for those with some matcha experience who are looking for a decent everyday option. It is also a highly versatile ingredient that adds a distinctive flavour and vibrant colour to your favourite recipes, including smoothies, desserts, and ice cream.

✓ Daily Health Supplement: Our matcha is packed with antioxidants, EGCG, polyphenols and essential nutrients that promote relaxation, metabolism and overall wellbeing. Shade-grown matcha naturally contains the amino acid L-theanine, which balances the effects of caffeine to provide calm focus and sustained energy for up to 6 hours, without the jitters or crashes associated with coffee.

✓ Trusted & Guaranteed: Our 2.1 oz / 60g tin contains 40 servings (1.5g per serving). Our ceremonial-grade matcha is ground into powder just before being dispatched to the USA, giving it a shelf life of one year. We highly recommend storing matcha in a cool, dry place or in the refrigerator. We offer a no-return satisfaction guarantee, so you can try it with confidence.

name: Micro Ingredients Organic Matcha Green Tea Powder, First Harvest, Culinary Grade from Japan, 100% Pure & Unflavored, Great for Tea, Latte, & Smoothies, Non-GMO, No Sugar, Eco-Friendly Packaging, 1 Lb
short_description: Micro Ingredients 100% fresh culinary grade matcha powder. A smooth tasting green tea powder that is derived from the young first harvest of this traditional Japanese tea plant. Using authentic early spring leaves to provide an earthy natural tasting matcha so you can add it to any of your favorite recipes or smoothies for enhanced flavor.

Matcha green tea is one of the most popular drinks in the world and Micro Ingredients offers the real deal. Providing a 1lb supply with 151 servings. A truly tasty raw matcha powder that is USDA organic.

This superfood plant is mainly used for its edible green leaves, which the whole leaf gets ground up to maximize potency and flavor. This allows for higher left over nutrients including caffeine and antioxidants. All you need to do is simply use the scoop we provide and you can start getting your matcha on.

Traditional matcha powder that you can enjoy in the comfort of your own home or take it on the go in your favorite drink. Micro ingredients fresh matcha green tea powder offers an all-natural flavor ground into a fine powder for easy mixing.

Authentic matcha powder that is not exposed to radiation and made without soy, dairy, gluten, and tree nuts. Ingredients must pass a 3rd party lab test to ensure our product is safe, pure, and potent.

name: AprikaLife Organic Matcha Powder, USDA & JAS Certified, No Sugar Added, Authentic Japanese Cafe Grade Matcha Green Tea Powder Perfect for Matcha Lattes, Smoothies & Baking, 3.5 oz/100g
short_description: PREMIUM QUALITY JAPANESE MATCHA - AprikaLife's stone-ground matcha powder features premium Yabukita tea leaves from Mie Prefecture, Japan, with USDA Organic and JAS certification to ensure the highest quality culinary-grade Japanese tea.

PERFECT FOR LATTES & CREATIVE RECIPES - Our signature 50/50 blend of first and early Summer harvest green tea leaves creates the ideal matcha latte powder. AprikaLife's premium tea powder transforms into vibrant smoothies, ice cream & baked treats.

NATURAL, CLEAN ENERGY - Get ready to experience steady energy boost with L-theanine for natural focus from our matcha latte blend. AprikaLife's pure Japanese tea provides natural L-theanine for steady energy without the jitters or crash of coffee.

PERFECTLY FRESH & FLAVORFUL - Preserve the peak quality of our Japanese matcha with vacuum-sealed packaging designed to lock in freshness. Our stone-ground process maintains the vibrant green color for Instagram-worthy lattes and culinary creations.

METICULOUSLY CRAFTED IN JAPAN - Our matcha is stone-ground using time-honored Japanese techniques refined over generations. We also screen for heavy metals, radiation, and over 250 potential chemicals to deliver unparalleled quality and peace of mind.

SUPERFOOD GREEN TEA POWDER – Matcha uses the entire tea leaf, offering natural energy and antioxidants to support focus, balance, and wellness. A delicious way to boost your body and mind every single day.

short_description: VERSATILE MATCHA POWDER: Enjoy a delicious matcha latte or smoothie with this convenient, unsweetened green tea powder made from Japan’s treasured matcha, finely milled from high quality green tea leaves.
UNSWEETENED MATCHA is perfect for hot or cold brewing; drink hot as a substitute for your morning coffee, brew & ice for a refreshing, afternoon beverage or pack it in your favorite travel cup.
TRY THEM ALL: We make a wide variety of delicious tea blends with chamomile, matcha, oolong, mint, peach, hibiscus & more. You can enjoy them as loose leaf teas, tea bags, bottled teas & powders.
SUSTAINABLE TEAS: We partner with the Japanese farming community to preserve the art & craft of tea harvesting. It's a part of our responsibility to the planet that starts in the fields of Japan.

THE ITO EN PHILOSOPHY: We believe green tea is a gift nature has given to us to share with others. Our premium quality teas always deliver good taste & unmatched health properties, from the ground up.
